attributes.action: Remove the image of Scotsman `A.Smith` from the Bank of ENGLAND`s 20 pound note
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is thoroughly insulting to the ENGLISH Nation to eface the Bank of England with a Scotsman Or any Bank of ENGLANDS bank notes or currency.
ENGLAND have many great, important individuals without having to import them.

reasons: Material which is potentially confidential, commercially sensitive, or which may cause personal distress or loss
